name: Day - Contrasts story
description:
It is not the mere idea of a new light upon a surface the one which can change its colours, but the arrival of the new light itself.
And only the existance of a contrast will lead you to realize how much paradise you were missing on your daily meals.

3500x3500
600ppp
original drawing: 25cm x 20 cm x 17 cm
oil pastels and markers on canvas
